Writer: Caspian Tredwell-Owen (screenplay), Alex Kurtzman (screenplay), Roberto Orci (screenplay), Caspian Tredwell-Owen (story)
Title: The Island
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Scarlett Johansson, Djimon Hounsou, Sean Bean
Plot: A man living in a futuristic sterile colony begins to question his circumscribed existence when his friend is chosen to go to the Island, the last uncontaminated place on earth.
